snippet.title: Indie Adventures - 0Space
snippet.description:
Dan and Matt try out a fun little gem known as 0Space, made by the lovely man-genius known as Beau Blyth. You can find this game and the others he has made over at http://teknopants.com/ 

Download 0Space: http://teknopants.com/games/0space/0space-5-23-11.zip

Visit Giant Bomb
==================
http://www.giantbomb.com

Follow Giant Bomb
==================================
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/#!/giantbomb
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/giantbombdotcom

Props To Interns
===========
Dan http://www.twitter.com/#!/danielcomfort
Perry http://www.twitter.com/#!/perryvandell
Steve http://www.twitter.com/#!/lemonpuddingpop
Matt http://www.twitter.com/#!/mattbodega If you like this, maybe you'd like to check out our website! http://bit.ly/bxFRTC
And our Facebook page! http://on.fb.me/hcyG1R
And Twitter! http://bit.ly/9SzULe
And Twitch! http://bit.ly/shzAI2
